analyzed: rigs dang ldan pa'i gang zag gis/_/rdo rje rnal 'byor ma sgrub bya/_/rang
translated: A person who possesses the lineage should accomplish Vajrayoginī.🔽Having generated oneself as the yidam deity,

analyzed: nyid yi dam lhar skyed la/_/byang chub sems ni sngon 'gro ba/_/mdun du e
translated: with bodhicitta as the preliminary,🔽in front, generate the source of phenomena from e.🔽In the center, from vaṃ, is a swirling ocean,

original: las chos 'byung skyed/_/de nang bam las rgya mtshhor 'khyil/_/hrilas pad+ma'i sdong
analyzed: las chos 'byung skyed/_/de nang bam las rgya mtshhor 'khyil/_/hrilas pad+ma'i sdong
translated: from hriṃ, a lotus stalk is generated,🔽on top of which is a lotus from paṃ.

original: por skyed/_/de steng pam las pad+ma bsgom/_/lte bar a las zla ba bsgom/_/de
analyzed: por skyed/_/de steng pam las pad+ma bsgom/_/lte bar a las zla ba bsgom/_/de
translated: Meditate on a moon from aṃ in the center,🔽on top of which is hriṃ, the essence of Khecarī.🔽In front, generate the guru from hūṃ,

original: steng hri_mkha' spyod ma/_/mdun du hum las bla ma skyed/_/g.yas su hri_las
analyzed: steng hri_mkha' spyod ma/_/mdun du hum las bla ma skyed/_/g.yas su hri_las
translated: to the right, generate Vajravārāhī from hriṃ,🔽and to the left, generate Ḍākiṇī from khaṃ.

original: spyan ras gzigs/_/g.yon du tam las sgrol ma bskyed/_/rgyab tu hum las mgon
analyzed: spyan ras gzigs/_/g.yon du tam las sgrol ma bskyed/_/rgyab tu hum las mgon
translated: Vajrapāṇi from a hum in the south.

original: po bskyed/_/mngon byang lnga 'am cho ga gsum/_/skad cig dag gis bskyed par
analyzed: po bskyed/_/mngon byang lnga 'am cho ga gsum/_/skad cig dag gis bskyed par
translated: Generate them in an instant through the five manifest enlightenments or the three rites.

original: bya/_/sa bon gnyis las 'od zer 'phros/_/bskul zhing sbyangs la spyan🔽rdo rje mkha' spyod ma sgrub pa'i thabs/🔽drangs la/_/phyi nang gsang ba gsum gyis mchod/_/ye shes sems dpa'
analyzed: bya/_/sa bon gnyis las 'od zer 'phros/_/bskul zhing sbyangs la spyan rdo rje mkha' spyod ma sgrub pa'i thabs/ drangs la/_/phyi nang gsang ba gsum gyis mchod/_/ye shes sems dpa'
translated: Light rays radiate from the two seed syllables, inviting the buddhas of the ten directions, who are requested to purify and🔽invite.🔽Offerings are made with the outer, inner, and secret offerings.🔽The awareness being is invoked and dissolves into the visualized deity.

original: bzhugs pa dang /_/sku gsum dbang bskur byas nas ni/_/gsol ba dag ni
analyzed: bzhugs pa dang /_/sku gsum dbang bskur byas nas ni/_/gsol ba dag ni
translated: The three-kaya empowerment is conferred, and then🔽the supplication is made.

original: gdab par bya/_/na mo 'bud d+ha ya/_na mo gu ru he badzra/_b+hi ra b+hi re na shri
analyzed: gdab par bya/_/na mo 'bud d+ha ya/_na mo gu ru he badzra/_b+hi ra b+hi re na shri
translated: namo buddhāya | namo guru hevajra bhirereṇa śrīye | dakada-🔽kinīye | dhokadhokinīye | sarvabudhabodhisattvebhyaḥ |

original: ye/_da ka da ki ni ye/_d+ho ka d+ho ki ni ye/_sarba bud d+ha bo te sa te satwa sa
analyzed: ye/_da ka da ki ni ye/_d+ho ka d+ho ki ni ye/_sarba bud d+ha bo te sa te satwa sa

original: ra nam/_ga tsha me/_de skad gsol ba lan gsum gdab/_/de nas bzlas pa
analyzed: ra nam/_ga tsha me/_de skad gsol ba lan gsum gdab/_/de nas bzlas pa
translated: Having made this supplication three times, then do the recitation.

original: bya ba ni/_/snying khar pam las pad+ma bsam/_/de steng a las zla ba bsam/_/sa
analyzed: bya ba ni/_/snying khar pam las pad+ma bsam/_/de steng a las zla ba bsam/_/sa
translated: and on that think of a moon from a.🔽The mantra recitation is:🔽Om vajra naratri tri hum phat svaha.

original: bon hrilas bskor ba ni/_/om badzra na ra tri tri hum phat swa ha/_om badzra rak+sha sa🔽man ta hu~m phat/_om ta re tud ta re tu re swa ha/_om badzra ma ha ka la k+shi k+she ta

translated: Om vajra rakṣa samanta hum phat.🔽Om tare tuttare ture svaha.🔽Om vajra mahākāla kṣi kṣe🔽taṭaṭa bhikṣaṇa vināyaka yakṣa hum hum phat phat svaha.

original: big nan bi na yak+sha hu~m hu~m phat phat swa ha/_de rnams gang sgrub snying po bzlas/_/
analyzed: big nan bi na yak+sha hu~m hu~m phat phat swa ha/_de rnams gang sgrub snying po bzlas/_/
translated: Recite the essence mantra of whichever one you are practicing.🔽Change the name of the retinue of whichever one you are practicing.

analyzed: gang sgrub gtsho 'khor brje bar bya'o/_/ma yengs zla ba gsum nas 'grub/_/de skad rdo rje mkha' spyod gsung /_/sangs rgyas rnams kyis byin brlabs pa'i/_/
translated: If you do this undistractedly for three months, you will succeed.🔽This is what Vajra Khecarī said.🔽The Jetsun said that this is the sacred pledge of🔽Gunaprabha and Atayavajra,

analyzed: 'gu na pa ka ra dang ni/_/a ta ya na badzra yi/_/thugs dam yin ces rje
